snippet: Officials in Ogden said Thursday they were trying to determine how a routine drug raid ended with one officer dead and two others in critical condition at a local hospital.
abstract: Officials in Ogden, Utah, are trying to determine how a routine drug raid ended with one officer dead and two others in critical condition; shooting occurred after officers from a task force involving the county sheriff’s office, local police departments and the federal Drug Enforcement Administration pushed their way into a house as part of an investigation.
lead_paragraph: Officials in Ogden said Thursday they were trying to determine how a routine drug raid ended with one officer dead and two others in critical condition at a local hospital.

headline.main: Utah: 1 Officer Killed and 5 Wounded in Drug Raid
headline.print_headline: Utah: 1 Officer Killed and 5 Wounded In Drug Raid
